org.mxupdate.eclipse.mxadapter
Class MXLoginPage

java.lang.Object
  org.eclipse.jface.window.Window
      org.eclipse.jface.dialogs.Dialog
          org.mxupdate.eclipse.mxadapter.MXLoginPage
All Implemented Interfaces:
org.eclipse.jface.window.IShellProvider
public class MXLoginPage
extends org.eclipse.jface.dialogs.Dialog

MX login page in the case the password of the user is not stored.

Version:
$Id: MXLoginPage.java 714 2010-02-07 11:46:06Z tim.moxter $
Author:
The MxUpdate Team
